price: (191) Do they associate with Him those who create nothing and they are [themselves] created?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
